Class Participation

Due: Ongoing
Worth: 20% of total grade

This is a discussion class. You're expected to come to every class meeting ready to discuss the day's readings or activities. In addition, you will need to participate in in-class training on the Arduino and 3d Printers. (Read more...)

Wiki Participation

Due: Ongoing
Worth: 20% of total grade

We will use a wiki (not wikipedia, a wiki of our own) to plan our class project. Your participation in this planning process is essential to the success of our build! (Read more...)

Case Study Presentation

Due: Various
Worth: 10% of total grade

Working in groups, students will find and present on case studies of existing Hacker projects. Any project that tried to use distributed, open technology to achieve a social goal is fair game. (Read more...)

Final Hacker Project Individual Score

Due: End of semester
Worth: 25% of total grade

As a class, we will work together to build a hacker/maker project. Each student will have their own assigned role in the larger group project, and the individual score will reflect their success at fulfilling that goal. (Read more...)

Final Hacker Project Group Score

Due: End of semester
Worth: 25% of total grade

As a class, we will work together to build a hacker/maker project. The group score will be assigned the class as a whole, based on the overall success of the project in achieving its goals. (Read more...)
